Question: The Vols ended the season ranked third and this person came in sixth in Heisman Trophy voting.
Hints: This person threw a 7 yard TD pass on 4th & 6 to rookie tight end Tom Santi to make the deficit 27–17.
This person, who had been criticized for failing to win big games, exorcised his big-game demons with the win.
This person helped the Colts to 4 different leads but could not lead a final touchdown drive for the win.
